meanings.definition: A drug used to treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder, bulimia nervosa, and panic disorder.
meanings.sent1: Fluoxetine helps people feel better when they are very sad.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe fluoxetine to help with different mental health problems.
meanings.sent3: Taking fluoxetine can turn a frown upside down.
meanings.sent4: In a world of darkness, fluoxetine shines a light of hope.
meanings.sent5: The effects of fluoxetine can be like a ray of sunshine breaking through the clouds.
